channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: This Week in Explainers: Why the India-EU trade pact is a big deal
Exclusive | What it takes for the President’s Bodyguard to ace the parade every Republic Day
How the rise of unqualified doctors is affecting Pakistan’s health system
Chips, onions wash ashore on England’s coast. The science, explained
India, EU on cusp of historic trade deal: What’s agreed, what are the sticking points?
Keep calm and stock freezers: How Greenland readies for a crisis
US Sutra | Dealing with Trump: What India must and must not do
item.description: As an emerging power with global ambitions, India must develop the analytical sophistication and diplomatic flexibility to engage effectively with leaders and systems that don’t conform to established patterns

item.title: West’s ‘rules-based’ lie is exposed: Why Bharat stands to gain from Trumpian disruption
item.description: Donald Trump has exposed the ‘rules-based international order’ as a selective posturing, triggering an internal Western reckoning that could open space for a new global order led by rising powers like Bharat

item.title: Why India’s restraint on Trump’s Gaza Peace Board is a wise move
item.description: In a world where strategic impatience increasingly defines great-power behaviour, India’s measured pause may be its most valuable contribution

item.title: Trump’s Board of Peace for Gaza: India’s strategic choices in a fading UN order
item.description: For India, the best option is to take cues from other major powers, and there is no need to bend too far forward or backward. Anything that brings global peace and allows free trade is desirable

item.title: Why India-EU trade pact is ‘Mother of All Deals’
item.description: Once the EU-India free trade agreement becomes a reality, the Americans will be keen to proceed with the India-US interim trade deal at the earliest too

item.title: How chaos came to Trump many certainties in the world
item.description: Donald Trump did not invent the chaotic style of leadership. But he dragged it back into the open, platformed it, stripped it of its subtlety, amplified it through social media, and made it the official gospel of the most powerful nation-state in the world
